scripts.build:node: npm run build && cat node.js.polyfill dist/aiae.js > dist/aiae.node.js
scripts.dev: npm install && concurrently "npm run build -- --watch" "tsc --watch" "esbuild --servedir=. --serve=:5432 --watch" "npm run dev:info"
scripts.dev:info:
sleep 3 && echo "

Open demos at http://$(hostname):5432/examples

"
scripts.test:watch: npm install && nodemon -e ts --exec "npm run test"
scripts.publish: npm run build:node && npm run build:dts
